review: Love having Amazon Prime Instant Videos!
author: Debbie Green

review: When it works which is not often is a great product, however it never wants to connect to my wireless network. It shows that it has full signal and when I try to connect it tells me that my wireless is out of range. I have the Google Chromecast in the same location and it works perfectly. Also all my wireless devices tablets, printers and phones connect flawlessly. I don't know if I just got a defective stick, but for now I would not recommend it.
author: Juan F. Zamora

review: I love my Amazon stick. I do not have cable in my room and have never thought to put it in bc of the stick. It's great and the remote ap for my phone is great when you loose the tiny remote
author: gabe diaz

review: I'm 100% satisfied.  I'm glad I did not spend the money on the box. This works perfectly
author: Yvi R

review: I love it, except for the pin number which has to be entered at all times.  I understand as we have grandchildren, but with every change is frustrating.
author: 9th grade teacher

review: Keeps cutting out from my Internet service, which is high speed. Fire stick also does not mirror the image of my 8.9 kindle hdx. I regret this purchase
author: Kindle Customer
